issue.title: [C++] fixed list support missing for binary_join
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13945](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13945). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The binary_join kernel currently supports:

list(string), string
list(large_string), large_string

it should support:

fixed_size_list(string), string
fixed_size_list(large_string), large_string
